abstract: "We have won!" "We have gained a clean victory!" President Vladimir Putin shouted, tears streaming, as he addressed tens of thousands of his supporters on Manezh Square in Moscow. Mr. Putin, who had served a stretch as prime minister after two previous terms as president, won a convincing victory in the Russian elections on Sunday, more than enough to avoid a runoff.

headline.main: Putin Wins, but Opposition Keeps Pressing
